review: Kudos & salute to Dr. SS Khambay for his jovial personality, relaxed demeanor, his know-how & oodles of patience. When I got diagnosed with a serious Jaw issue which needed immediate surgery I met all top maxillofacial surgeons in Mumbai including Dr. Khambay. One meeting with him is all it took for me to be convinced about which surgeon gets to insert the scalpel into my mouth. I have been in touch with the good doctor over texts, phone calls & monthly visits from the last 6 months now. His pleasing personality & affable nature plays an equal role in the healing process. Highly recommended for any major surgery related to jawline or facial reconstruction. Thank you Sir for all your help & support.

I was suffering from TMJ pain since many years, he is the first doctor to have resolved my issue after taking pain killers for years, wearing mouth guard while sleeping, taking hot packs constantly and almost burning my face, he recommended me a simple inexpensive and effective solution. Since then my pain has reduced drastically.
He is not just a great doctor but also a very sweet person.
Very cooperative and analysis all the report and suggest to my son jaw issue so we highly recommended to visit and get the openion for any maxofacial issue.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very friendly, experienced, properly explained the report and advised the treatment. Recommended for Maxilo facial treatment
